weather.summary: Saturday: 12°C, overcast clouds. Sunday: 13°C, overcast clouds

metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend filled with awesome adventures! We've got trains to ride, diggers to explore, and maybe even some muddy puddles to splash in – plus, check out those dinosaurs!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure
activities.description: Explore the biggest urban farm in Europe! See llamas, sheep, and other farm animals. Enjoy the open space and fresh air – perfect for a run around!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A brilliant DLR train ride followed by a chance to see loads of animals, perfect for a little explorer!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute, 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR for the best views!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: Meet pigs, goats, donkeys, and chickens at this friendly local farm. Enjoy a snack at the cafe and maybe even try some pottery!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll love seeing the animals up close and maybe even getting a little muddy!

transport.tip: Check out the pottery workshop for a hands-on activity!

activities.title: Olympic Park Playground Fun
activities.description: Explore the massive playgrounds at Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park. Tumbling Bay offers sand and water play, perfect for getting muddy!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can run, climb, splash, and get muddy in the fantastic playgrounds!

transport.tip: Pack a change of clothes for Tumbling Bay!

activities.title: Victoria Park Adventure
activities.description: Enjoy two great playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure. A classic Hackney park for a family day out.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll love the playgrounds and seeing the deer!

transport.tip: Take a picnic to enjoy by the lake!

activities.title: Young V&A Playtime
activities.description: Explore the under 5s play area at the Young V&A. Enjoy design workshops and interactive exhibits.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can play and explore in a space designed just for his age group.

transport.tip: Check the website for workshop times.

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Immerse yourself in interactive storytelling, dressing up, and character visits. A magical experience for young imaginations.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll love the dressing up and interactive elements!

transport.tip: Check the website for character visit schedules.

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure at the Natural History Museum
activities.description: Explore the incredible dinosaur gallery, featuring a T-Rex skeleton! Check out the Blue Whale and the Wildlife Garden.

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, Victoria line to Green Park, Piccadilly line to South Kensington, 50 mins
transport.tip: Go early to avoid crowds in the Dinosaur gallery.

activities.title: London Transport Museum Exploration
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, try the tube simulator, and play in the All Aboard zone. Perfect for transport enthusiasts!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He can climb on real buses and trains!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, Victoria line to Oxford Circus, Piccadilly line to Covent Garden, 45 mins
transport.tip: Take advantage of the free entry for under 18s!

activities.title: National Maritime Museum & Greenwich Fun
activities.description: Explore ships, play in the AHOY! children's gallery, and enjoy the playground outside. A great day out in historic Greenwich.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Combine a DLR ride with exploring ships and a playground!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Stratford, DLR to Cutty Sark, 40 mins
transport.tip: Take the DLR all the way to Cutty Sark for a scenic ride.

activities.title: RAF Museum Airplane Adventure
activities.description: See huge aircraft, enjoy the 4D cinema, and play in the outdoor playground. Perfect for plane enthusiasts!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll be amazed by the huge airplanes!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, Victoria line to Euston, Northern line to Colindale, 50 mins
transport.tip: Check out the 4D cinema for an immersive experience.

activities.title: Coram's Fields City Farm & Sandpit
activities.description: Enjoy a city farm, a great sandpit, and a safe play environment. Adults only allowed when accompanying children.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll love the sandpit and seeing the farm animals!

transport.tip: Remember, adults can only enter with children.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Park Dinosaurs & Farm
activities.description: See Victorian dinosaur statues on islands, visit the farm, and get lost in the maze. A fun day out with lots to explore.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll be amazed by the dinosaur statues!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shoreditch High Street, Overground to Canada Water, Jubilee line to London Bridge, National Rail to Crystal Palace, 1hr 15 mins
transport.tip: Bring a picnic to enjoy by the lake.

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: See Hey Duggee and the Squirrel Club live on stage! Earn badges and sing along to your favourite songs.

transport.tip: Book tickets early for best seats.

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: Experience life-size dinosaur puppets on stage! An interactive and exciting show for dinosaur lovers.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: He'll be amazed by the life-size dinosaur puppets!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance along with Peppa Pig and her friends in this fun-filled live show.

transport.tip: Get ready to sing and dance!

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: See Bluey and Bingo in their first live theatre show! Based on the popular CBeebies show.

transport.tip: Get ready for some fun and games!

activities.title: The Gruffalo
activities.description: See the classic story of the Gruffalo come to life on stage! A fun and engaging show for all ages.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: A great show for young kids!

transport.tip: Book tickets early for best seats.

activities.title: Half Moon Theatre Show
activities.description: Check their website for upcoming shows specifically for young children. A great local theatre!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: Easy to get to and always has good shows!

transport.tip: Check the website to find age appropriate shows
